website_summaries.verdict: With a combination of ample size, durability, and features that make it easy to set up, this inflatable pool is an excellent choice for warm-weather fun.
pros: Distances itself from other inflatable pools by having three air chambers with six valves for added strength, weight distribution, and leak prevention
Offers enough room for several kids or adults
has two drain plugs that make it easy to take down
cons: May lean when filled if placed on uneven ground
Pricier than competitors, but it has a lot to offer for the money

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this swimming pool for almost a month and then I write this review, as I was waiting for the right time to test it, finally I tried, and it works good, and the size is just right for my back yard, my kids love it very much. which is long enough, so a whole family can sit in it, even though adults can not swim there, at least and sit inside to relax, and kids can learn how to swim with that, it is safer than playing outside beach.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Li

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Kids will love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact i don't have to go to a public pool we can just go in the house and eat lunch and right back out to the pool. No driving..just like you i spent days reading reviews and finally i just hit proceed to check out and the pool was here in no time.it pumps up fast! It is worth it.what are you waiting for.hit the button😉
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Durability and sturdiness is non-existent.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pool and the cover to have it available for hot afternoon playtime. It didn't even hold up for 2 days! We inflated the pool and filled it on a Thursday... by Friday it was done. The sides were losing air which caused for them to bend. We were cautious and filled it below the max so that we wouldn't compromise the integrity of the pool by over filling it. I'm extremely disappointed. I thought spending close to $100 (pool and cover) it would make it through the season. It didn't even make it through a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this pool for my niece, but I double-gifted. So I kept it. My girlfriend dumped me at the end of May, and I ended up having to spend the Fourth of July by myself. This pool may have saved my life. I was alone and sad and depressed, but filling up this pool on my front lawn gave me a glimmer of happiness and hope. It made me feel better during a dark time. Thank you, Sable Inflatable Pool. I love you.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Raeber

customer_reviews.title: Love this pool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool for the 4th of July weekend and it was perfect! Easy to blow up with my husband’s compressor and didn’t take long to fill. I have 4 small grandkids ages 2 to 4 years and they had a blast. The men (my son and son-in-law) loved it for cooling off after they finished “slaving” over the hot bbq grill! All in all a great purchase and it looks strong enough that we should get a lot of use out if it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! Toddler, 8 yo and adult fit together easily. In placed on uneven ground and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: danielle thompson

customer_reviews.title: Worth to have one
customer_reviews.text: My family and I enjoyed the time in this swimming pool. There is plenty of room for 2 adults and 2 children.The inflation process is very fast.Also it is very convenient to pack up after playing. Everything is so perfect.Worth to have one in the summer .
customer_reviews.author: Captain-Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Summer finally comes to NY and I’m finally able to test out this inflatable pool! Inflated it using water bottle and hair dryer method only takes about few minutes. Although I have the dimensions in mind but it’s lot bigger after it’s inflated! My 5 and 6 year old girl got their first try in the pool and they just love it! There are even plenty of room for adults not to swim in but just lay in and relax! We empty out water every time just for safety reason! Happy summer everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Y.W

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool works perfect for my 7, 4, 3 years old and myself. Enough space for all of us. I have a small air pump, the first I blew it up and it took for hours. I drain it once a week and spray with bleach, let it sit a bit and then spray out with hose. It is the perfect family pool, we are in it most everyday. Fun for everyone, very nice pool!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pool for my Granddaughters 3rd Birthday. Children from the age of 3, to age 6 enjoyed splashing and playing in the water. All of the children seemed to enjoy the pool. Pool is sturdy, strong plastic, and it held the air quite long. I still think that 78.00 is a bit much but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesecakelady

customer_reviews.title: All around great product
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Inflated quickly, stayed inflated, in filled up so quickly I had to poor some out! My grandkids love it. It also drained fast, and when left in the sun as directed, dried fast and was easy to clean. Then it deflates fast. So, really, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: fun but don't last
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pool but it sprung an unpatchable leak (second pool) & I had to send it back after just 35 days. Amazon was great about it even though the usual return time had expired. Thank you Amazon ...
customer_reviews.author: maint man

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one summer.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this pool for one season. After storing it safely and nicely for the winter and blowing it up again for the kids to use - it has been riddled with cracks and holes in the plastic. This was an expensive one season use. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool size but difficult to remove mold.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice size pool but it became moldy a few days after using it. I could not clean it off. Sadly, I had to throw it out. Someone else I knew bought the same pool, and the same thing happened to them.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Sides sag and will not hold air
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used this it wouldn’t hold air for even 30 minutes. Even with the pool not in use the sides will still sag within hours. Not sure if we just received a defective product or not, but pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Blow-up Swimming Pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool is heavy duty and easy to blow up. Of course you need a pump. The pool is also large enough that a couple of adults can lounge in it, however, I bought it for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Renault

customer_reviews.title: Summer time
customer_reviews.text: We do love this pool. I didn’t want a pool because I don’t want to be the one to have to clean it. However, once we blew it up and filled it, we noticed a hole. My husband taped it. It was a lot of work to blow it up and then fill it. Our toddler wants to spend all day on it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: We just used this over the weekend and it didn't hold water. It has at least 2 holes in it. Do not buy this item!!
customer_reviews.author: honeybee

customer_reviews.title: Eh, not really worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Popped a small leak after 2nd use, more leaks after about a month to the point where now it's just garbage. Tried to patch but material makes it difficult, and too many holes for the one patch they give you. Save your money or buy from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is good for three toddlers to swim.
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite so far. Great! Three toddlers loveed to swim in there and water play. Awesome! Size is great easy to inflate safe.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Ever since we put this up, it hasn't held air. I don't feel this pool was worth the money spent. Sadly, we didn't get to put it up and use it until after the return window.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Patching holes
customer_reviews.text: I had to patch holes in the bottom of this within a week of it being up. Other than that it was okay
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bigger size one , and it’s like 2 queens size bed。it can fit least 4-5kid inside the pool , and I can just bring than to my backyard dont need to go to public pool with summer hot weather.and the pool are very easy to set up , and release the water. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Guoxu

customer_reviews.title: Make me happy and comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool because my husband said we couldn't afford a big one. To my amazement I really like it! We both fit in it comfortably and I use it alone to relax on a float. Easy to set up but make sure it is on a level surface otherwise the downhill side of pool may bulge out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best "Kid" pool I've bought
customer_reviews.text: A lot more durable than past kid pools. I've got two rambunctious boys that have put this thing through the ringer. The pool has held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth, great for kids
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my nephews, one just turn one, one just turn two years old. they love play water, so i got this for them. it super easy for install, it doesn't come with air pump, but i got one air pump for my air bed it good for this inflatable pool also. it take me 15-20 mins to get it done. we put it on our backyard. i put some bath toys in there, my two nephews have so much fun with it. good size and good value of money. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tung Ting Wong

customer_reviews.title: seems high quality but deflated in first week
customer_reviews.text: This seems like the highest quality inflatable pool we've had. The plastic is thicker than most inflatable pools. Bu the top ring still got a hole in it and deflated within the first week. It wasn't from a puncture, it was from the pressure of kids jumping on it, from what I can tell. Moral of the story: just buy cheap inflatable pools because with kids it's not going to last either way.
customer_reviews.author: samuel dean andres

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable pool. We placed a thick tarp underneath the pool. Buy a pool cover to cover the pool when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: techbug

customer_reviews.title: Good pool for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my grandson. It is larger than I expected and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Counslermom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pool for the price and great customer service. First one we had a slow leak in it and contacted them about it, had one sent out instantly in replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a large pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool was the hit of my daughter's 5th birthday party! It was easy to inflate, held the water nicely and emptied incredibly easily. The price was right for such a large pool. Very impressed with the quality. I'd definitely recommend this pool for households with kids and adults who like to join them in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: OFFER ZEPEDA

customer_reviews.title: decent size
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely loved it. It started their summer off right.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our trip to dominican republic the kids had so much fun they were always playing in the pool sometimes even we the grown up enjoy it too..
customer_reviews.author: Emely

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great pool for a smaller area. It’s our pop up pool when it’s hot outside. Used it on the 4th and the kids loved it. Easy to get aired up and easy to put away for another day. Even some of the adults got in to cool off.
customer_reviews.author: Jack G

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great so far. Easy to blow up and fill and enjoy. We fit 6 full size people in it.
customer_reviews.author: fg

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pool
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have this pool. It great gift for July 4.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool. Great buy! One plug was missing but we used a cork!! Problem fixed!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma jules

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Summer is here and this is perfect for my family .It has 3 individual for preventing air leakage. I can swimming with my kids in my yard.The edge almost comes up to my shoulders and I can comfortably float. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. I had it for a get together and kids left all the adults alone. They didn’t want to get out.
customer_reviews.author: TINA COOPER

customer_reviews.title: great vale and size
customer_reviews.text: it is perfect size for grown ups looking to have a pool without digging into the ground
customer_reviews.author: Alina Zakirova

customer_reviews.title: I'm wondering what can I do to get another one or refund
customer_reviews.text: This damage I cannot put the air on it because I have four small holes on the top
customer_reviews.author: Katraloco

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids have enjoyed this pool all summer! Drains easy for clean up. It is very durable, we use it several times a week with no issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: My kids are loving this pool!! It's super spacious and deep. We have been enjoying it on these hot summer days!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Swif

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be a cheaper price. It takes a little longer to inflate then I thought.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY M

product_meta.title: Sable Inflatable Pool, Blow Up Swim Center Family Pool for Toddlers, Kids, 118" X 72" X 20", for Ages 3+, Blue & White
product_meta.description:
Sable - A New Level of Comfort 
Transform your home into your very own oasis of pure comfort. Sable’s products - ranging from richly textured blankets to ingenious massaging devices - promise you an unprecedented relaxation experience. Lean back and we provide everything you need to achieve the most comforting and warm ambience for your home. 

Technical Specifications: 
Dimensions: 118 x 72.5 x 20 in
Capacity: 312 Gallons 


What’s in the Box:
1 x Sable Inflatable Pool
1 x User Guide
feature_bullets: Family-size pool: recommend up to 2 adults plus 4 kids to a enjoy splashing pool party in the backyard.
Safe & durable: Made with Phthalate and lead free, which is 50% thicker than most in the market, reducing the risk of punctures and ensuring a long service life
Long waiting be gone: inflate in 3-4 minute by electric pump (not included), 2 water valves double the drainage speed
Strong and stable structure: 3 individual air chambers can withstand extra weight while preventing air leakage so the pool is always ready for fun
Solid customer service: Comes with a 12-month warranty, and you can extend it to 30 months by simply registering your product

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
